message:
SYSTEM: KGEOntologies_2021.pdf: Página 20
An Ontology-Based Deep Learning Approach for Triple Classification with Out-of-Knowledge-Base Entities
Step 6: Performance Assessment
20
Once the model has been trained and validated with
the fully-known set, we evaluate the model over the
OOKB and known entity sets…
𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑇= 𝑎𝑐𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑐𝑦𝑘𝑛𝑜𝑤𝑛𝑠𝑒𝑡
𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑂= 𝑎𝑐𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑐𝑦𝑂𝑂𝐾𝐵𝑠𝑒𝑡
𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑇≫𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑂Ontological information is not been appropriately
introduced
𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑇≈𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑂The model is correctly introducing the ontological
information and is capable of generalizing
𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑇≪𝐴𝑐𝑐𝑂Non-optimal parameter selection. The model is
diverging from the optimal solution
speaker: SYSTEM
